      • cuttingPoint

        public static java.util.List<com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point> cuttingPoint(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point extremity1,
                                                                             com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point extremity2,
                                                                             LineRoad r1,
                                                                             LineRoad r2,
                                                                             com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Point pt_I)
        Determines the cutting points on each road by projecting both extremities of the arc on each road. Only farthest point from the intersection are conserved
        Parameters:
        extremity1 - One extremity
        extremity2 - Another extremity
        r1 - One road
        r2 - Another road
        pt_I - intersection point
        Returns:
        List of the cutting points
